text: The 1949–50 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team represented the University of Idaho during the 1949–50 NCAA college basketball season. Members of the Pacific Coast Conference, the Vandals were led by third-year head coach Charles Finley and played their home games on campus at Memorial Gymnasium in Moscow, Idaho. The Vandals were overall and in conference play. ==References== ==External links== *Sports Reference – Idaho Vandals: 1949–50 basketball season *Gem of the Mountains: 1950 University of Idaho yearbook – 1949–50 basketball season *Idaho Argonaut – student newspaper – 1950 editions Category:Idaho Vandals men's basketball seasons Idaho Idaho
title: 1949–50 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team
